column4: hi all, i have a problem, i done a fresh install of dapper and cannot get my wifi to work. it's a WPC54G V3 (im using https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/WirelessCardsSupported as a reference)
and i still can't get my wifi working.
i have a linksys wmp54G v4 with Rt2500 chhipset. I just have to config it and make it actve with system.admin/networking
i'm a bit new to linux, you'll have to forgive me =[
